channel.title: CVE Feed for F5 -- NGINX Ingress Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F5 -- NGINX Ingress Controller

item.title: CVE-2022-30535|2024-08-03T06:48:36.417Z -- f5 -- nginx%20ingress%20controller
item.description: In versions 2.x before 2.3.0 and all versions of 1.x, An attacker authorized to create or update ingress objects can obtain the secrets available to the NGINX Ingress Controller. Note: Software versions which have reached End of Technical Support (EoTS) are not evaluated.
